00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 #ifndef PIZ_LINKLIST_H
00043 #define PIZ_LINKLIST_H
00044 
00045 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 
00048 #include "pizTypes.h"
00049 
00050 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * \def     PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_NONE 
00055  * \brief   Don't free items.
00056  * \ingroup linklist
00057  */
00058  
00059 /**
00060  * \def     PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_FREE_MEMORY 
00061  * \brief   (DEFAULT) Free items with \c free().
00062  * \ingroup linklist
00063  */
00064  
00065 /**
00066  * \def     PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_FREE_GROWING_ARRAY 
00067  * \brief   Free items with \c pizGrowingArrayFree().
00068  * \ingroup linklist
00069  */
00070  
00071 #define PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_NONE                  (0L)
00072 #define PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_FREE_MEMORY           (1<<0)
00073 #define PIZ_LINKLIST_FLAG_FREE_GROWING_ARRAY    (1<<1)
00074 
00075 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * \ingroup linklist
00080  */
00081  
00082 typedef struct _PIZLinklistElement {
00083     void                        *ptr;               /* Pointer to the item. */
00084     struct _PIZLinklistElement  *next;              /* Pointer to next element. */
00085     struct _PIZLinklistElement  *previous;          /* Pointer to previous element. */
00086     } PIZLinklistElement;
00087 
00088 /**
00089  * \ingroup linklist 
00090  */
00091  
00092 typedef struct _PIZLinklist {
00093     long                flags;                      /* Flags as bit field. */
00094     long                count;                      /* Number of elements in the linked list. */
00095     PIZLinklistElement  *head;                      /* Pointer to head element. */
00096     PIZLinklistElement  *tail;                      /* Pointer to tail element. */
00097     PIZLinklistElement  *cache;                     /* Pointer to cached element. */
00098     } PIZLinklist;
00099 
00100 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 
00103 PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE
00104 
00105 /**
00106  * \brief   Create the linked list.
00107  * \details In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
00108  * \return  A pointer to the new linked list.
00109  * \ingroup linklist
00110  */
00111 PIZLinklist *pizLinklistNew (void);
00112 
00113 /**
00114  * \brief   Set linked list's bit flags.
00115  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00116  * \param   flags Bit flags.
00117  * \ingroup linklist
00118  */
00119 void pizLinklistSetFlags (PIZLinklist *x, long flags);
00120 
00121 /**
00122  * \brief   Free the linked list.
00123  * \details It is safe to pass NULL pointer. 
00124  *          Item's memory is released according to flags.
00125  * \param   x A Pointer.
00126  * \ingroup linklist
00127  */
00128 void pizLinklistFree (PIZLinklist *x);
00129 
00130 /**
00131  * \brief   Clear the linked list.
00132  * \details Item's memory is released according to flags.
00133  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00134  * \ingroup linklist
00135  */
00136 void pizLinklistClear (PIZLinklist *x);
00137 
00138 /**
00139  * \brief   Append an item's pointer to the linked list.
00140  * \details The provided pointer can not be NULL.
00141  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00142  * \param   ptr A pointer to the item.
00143  * \return  An error code.
00144  * \ingroup linklist
00145  */
00146 PIZError pizLinklistAppend (PIZLinklist *x, void *ptr);
00147 
00148 /**
00149  * \brief   Insert an item's pointer in front of the linked list.
00150  * \details The provided pointer can not be NULL.
00151  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00152  * \param   ptr A pointer to the item.
00153  * \return  An error code.
00154  * \ingroup linklist
00155  */
00156 PIZError pizLinklistInsert (PIZLinklist *x, void *ptr);
00157 
00158 /**
00159  * \brief   Get an item's pointer with specified index.
00160  * \details If there is no item at the index, pointer is set to NULL.
00161  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00162  * \param   index The index (zero-based).
00163  * \param   ptr The adress of the pointer to set.
00164  * \return  An error code.
00165  * \ingroup linklist
00166  */
00167 PIZError pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (PIZLinklist *x, long index, void **ptr);
00168 
00169 /**
00170  * \brief   Get the next item's pointer of a given item's pointer.
00171  * \details If there is no item next, pointer is set to NULL.
00172  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00173  * \param   ptr The item's pointer provided.
00174  * \param   nextPtr The adress of the pointer to set.
00175  * \return  An error code.
00176  * \remark  The following shows how to traverse a linked list using cache optimization.  
00177  * \code
00178  * PIZNote *note       = NULL;
00179  * PIZNote *nextNote   = NULL;
00180  *
00181  * pizLinklistPtrAtIndex (linklist, 0, (void **)&note);
00182  *
00183  * while (note) {
00184  *      pizLinklistNextByPtr (linklist, (void *)note, (void **)&nextNote);
00185  *
00186  *      //pizLinklistRemoveByPtr (linklist, (void *)note)); 
00187  *
00188  *      note = nextNote;
00189  * }
00190  *
00191  * \endcode
00192  * \ingroup linklist
00193  */
00194 PIZError pizLinklistNextByPtr (PIZLinklist *x, void *ptr, void **nextPtr);
00195 
00196 /**
00197  * \brief   Given an item's pointer, remove this item from the linked list.
00198  * \details Item's memory is released according to flags.
00199  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00200  * \param   ptr The item's pointer provided.
00201  * \return  An error code.
00202  * \ingroup linklist
00203  */
00204 PIZError pizLinklistRemoveByPtr (PIZLinklist *x, void *ptr);
00205 
00206 /**
00207  * \brief   Like pizLinklistRemoveByPtr() but do NOT free item's memory.
00208  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00209  * \param   ptr The item's pointer provided.
00210  * \return  An error code.
00211  * \ingroup linklist
00212  */
00213 PIZError pizLinklistChuckByPtr (PIZLinklist *x, void *ptr);
00214 
00215 /**
00216  * \brief   Swap item's pointers in the linked list according to specified indexes.
00217  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00218  * \param   m Item's index (zero-based).
00219  * \param   n Item's index (zero-based).
00220  * \return  An error code.
00221  * \ingroup linklist
00222  */
00223 PIZError pizLinklistSwapByIndexes (PIZLinklist *x, long m, long n);
00224 
00225 /**
00226  * \brief   Get the number of items in the linked list.
00227  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00228  * \return  The number of items.
00229  * \ingroup linklist
00230  */
00231 long pizLinklistCount (const PIZLinklist *x);
00232 
00233 PIZ_END_C_LINKAGE

00236 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237 
00238 #ifdef PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE
00239 
00240 PIZ_EXTERN void pizLinklistSetFlags (PIZLinklist *x, long flags)
00241 {
00242     x->flags = flags;
00243 }
00244 
00245 PIZ_EXTERN long pizLinklistCount (const PIZLinklist *x)
00246 {
00247     return (x->count);
00248 }
00249 
00250 #endif // PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE

00252 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 #endif // PIZ_LINKLIST_H
